passage_text: Our free calculator uses recent, trusted data to estimate costs for your Synthetic Decking Installation project. For a basic 120 square feet project in zip code 47474, the benchmark cost to Install Synthetic Decking ranges between $13.39 - $16.92 per square foot* . To estimate costs for your project: 1.

1 For polypropylene-based decking, the average cost is $8.68 per square foot. 2  For solid polyvinyl chloride (PVC)-based decking, the average cost per square foot is $9.48 though buying this material in hollow slats can reduce the cost to around $7.50

To get an idea of what this means to consumers, an estimated 140,000 plastic bags are in a 500-square foot Trex deck. 1  The total project cost for a Trex deck will be from $1,500 to $2,200 for a 250-square-foot deck. 2  Trex Select of basic quality averages approximately $7 per square foot.

Composite Decking Costs. 1  Average: $35 per square foot. 2  For polythylene-based composite decking, the average cost per square foot is $7.82. 3  For polypropylene-based decking, the average cost is $8.68

1 The total project cost for a Trex deck will be from $1,500 to $2,200 for a 250-square-foot deck. 2  Trex Select of basic quality averages approximately $7 per square foot. 3  Trex Enhance of higher quality is approximately $8 per square foot. 4  Trex Transcend, the highest grade, ranges between $9 and $9.50
